title: Extension of the term of office of the National Delimitation Committee on Demarcation of Wards for Local Authorities
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. A.L.M. Athaullah, Minister of Local Government and Provincial Councils, to extend the term of office of the National Delimitation Committee on Demarcation of Wards  of Local Authorities from 2014?12?31 to 2015?03?10, was approved by the Cabinet.
